name: Robert Edward BUTLER, petitioner, v. Howard W. CLARKE, Director, Virginia Department of Corrections.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Robert Edward BUTLER, petitioner,
v.
Howard W. CLARKE, Director, Virginia Department of Corrections.
attorneys: Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and petition for writ of certiorari dismissed. See Rule 39.8.
casebody.head_matter:
Robert Edward BUTLER, petitioner,
v.
Howard W. CLARKE, Director, Virginia Department of Corrections.
No. 18-8201.
Supreme Court of the United States
April 15, 2019.
Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and petition for writ of certiorari dismissed. See Rule 39.8.
